page.title: 18TOURISM-TEANASSIE
page.content: Our area is popular with tourists. There are many different species of birds and animals around.It is a peacful area.The salmon fishing is very good on the River Beauly.There are many chalet parks and places to stay.When in our area you can visit Beauly Priory.Beauly village is good for shopping for food and getting souveniers.There are plenty of good places to eat.In Inverness you can go to the theatre and films.Glen Affric is beautiful when the weather is good. Hillwalking is a good idea if you are on holiday in this area.The deer farm attracts quite a lot of tourists.The fish pass is open to the public.Lots of people have their gardens open for show.Boating holidays are good fun when the weather's sunny.Pony treking is popular and is a good way to see the surrounding countryside.
